# requiredAuthorizations

**Type Property**

The authorization types you need to use the barcode detection provider.

## Declaration

```swift
static var requiredAuthorizations: [ARKitSession.AuthorizationType] { get }
```

## Type properties

- **isSupported**: A Boolean value that determines whether a device supports the barcode detection provider.
